mainSequence.step: UserX queries Server A for data with version=null
Server A requests data from Distributed Cache for itemID=1, version=null
Distributed Cache replies with itemID=1, version=12:00, inventory=10 to Server A
Server A returns data itemID=1, version=12:00, inventory=10 to UserX
UserX saves version=12:00 in cookie/local storage
UserX queries Server A for data with version=12:00
Server A checks local cache and serves data itemID=1, version=12:00, inventory=10 to UserX
UserY queries Server B for data with version=null
Server B requests data from Distributed Cache for itemID=1, version=null
Distributed Cache replies with itemID=1, version=12:05, inventory=8 to Server B
Server B returns data itemID=1, version=12:05, inventory=8 to UserY
UserY saves version=12:05 in cookie/local storage
UserY queries Server B for data with version=12:05
Server B checks local cache and serves data itemID=1, version=12:05, inventory=8 to UserY
UserY queries Server A for data with version=12:05
Server A checks local cache for version=12:00, then requests latest data from Distributed Cache for itemID=1, version=12:05
Distributed Cache replies with itemID=1, version=12:10, inventory=8 to Server A
Server A returns data itemID=1, version=12:10, inventory=8 to UserY
UserY saves version=12:10 in cookie/local storage
UserX queries Server A for data with version=12:00
Server A checks local cache for version=12:10 and serves data itemID=1, version=12:10, inventory=8 to UserX
